name: Aaron Allen
summary: Full Stack .NET Developer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and enterprise applications. Skilled in C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, React, Angular, and React Native. Experienced in AI/ML integration using Python, FastAPI, and TensorFlow/PyTorch. Adept at building secure, high-performance, and testable systems, implementing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and optimizing application performance through caching, query tuning, and asynchronous processing. Proficient in CI/CD automation with Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions, Agile methodologies, and mentoring junior engineers, delivering enterprise-grade solutions in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered enterprise-grade backend systems using C#/.NET Core and ASP.NET Core, designing RESTful APIs, microservices, and background processing pipelines supporting high-volume, business-critical workflows.

Led development of modern frontend applications using React, Angular, and React Native, improving usability and reducing feature delivery time through reusable component architectures and clean API integrations.

Designed and optimized SQL Server and PostgreSQL data models using Entity Framework Core, improving query performance and reducing database-related incidents through indexing, query tuning, and controlled migrations.

Integrated Python-based AI/ML services into .NET platforms using FastAPI and TensorFlow/PyTorch, enabling intelligent search, recommendation features, and predictive analytics used by internal teams and customer-facing applications.

Implemented comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end testing (xUnit, NUnit, Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress), increasing test coverage and significantly reducing production defects and regression issues.

Improved application performance and scalability by implementing Redis caching, asynchronous processing, and optimized data access patterns, reducing API response times and improving system stability under peak load.
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions, automating builds, tests, and deployments and reducing release cycles from days to hours.
Participated in architecture reviews and technical decision-making, ensuring solutions met security, maintainability, and scalability requirements for enterprise environments.
Mentored junior engineers through code reviews, pair programming, and technical guidance, improving team productivity and promoting best practices in design patterns, testing, and Agile development.

experience.title: Senior Developer
bullets: Developed full-stack applications using .NET Core, React.js, and Node.js, delivering internal tools and customer-facing dashboards used by operations and business stakeholders.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, handling authentication, validation, and business logic, improving system reliability and simplifying frontend-backend integration.
Built and optimized SQL Server and MongoDB data models to support transactional workflows and analytics use cases, improving data consistency and query performance.
Implemented backend and frontend testing using xUnit, Jest, Mocha, and Chai, reducing production issues and improving confidence in frequent releases.
Collaborated closely with designers, product owners, and stakeholders to translate requirements into scalable technical solutions, consistently delivering features on schedule.
Used Docker, Git, and CI workflows to standardize development environments and improve deployment reliability across environments.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer

Assisted in building backend services using C# .NET and Node.js, supporting REST-style endpoints for user management and internal operational tools.
Worked with SQL Server and MongoDB to design schemas, write queries, and support CRUD operations for production systems.
Diagnosed and resolved frontend and backend issues reported by QA and users, improving application stability and reducing recurring defects.
Participated in Agile/Scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, estimation, and retrospectives, gaining experience in collaborative, iterative development.
